    • forceDeequip

      public boolean forceDeequip(Predicate<net.minecraft.item.ItemStack> isBad)
      Tries to de-equip any item that we don't want equipped.
      Parameters:
      isBad - : Whether an item is bad/shouldn't be equipped
      Returns:
      Whether we successfully de-equipped, or if we didn't have the item equipped at all.
